alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 28 at 3:34AM MDT until March 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...the higher elevations and the east slopes of the Sacramento Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will lead to hazardous travel conditions, especially along north/south roads and highways. Damage to structures is possible with the strong winds.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
